predicate.note: Frames file for 'miff' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: What *trace* miffed many USX executives and shareholders was that the acquisition, for $3 billion of stock, doubled the USX shares outstanding and considerably diluted them.
example.arg: *trace* -> What -> that the acquisition, for $3 billion of stock, doubled the USX shares outstanding and considerably diluted them

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: John was sorely miffed *trace* by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie.
example.arg: Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie
